module.name: User Management
module.description: This Module manages all IssabelPBX users excluding Administrators (at this time). It allows an Administrator to create a User Account that can be used by other applications for login or API purposes. Modules like iSymphony or Rest API or the Upcoming User Control Panel will use this module to manage their users.
module.changelog: *2.11.15* Rebranding changes *2.11.14* Initial Issabel Foundation release
